questions.q: Is the blender blitzed for 20 seconds?
followup: Does the person add 1/2 tsp baking powder to the blender?
Does the person add 1 banana to the blender?
Does the person add an egg to the blender?

questions.q: Did the person melt a small knob of butter in non-stick frying pan over low medium heat?
followup: Has the person blitzed the blender for 20 seconds?

questions.q: Does the person pour three little puddles straight from blender into frying pan?
followup: Has the person melted butter in a non-stick frying pan over low medium heat?

questions.q: Is the person cooking the batter for 1 min or until the top starts to bubble?
followup: Has the person poured three little puddles of batter from the blender into the frying pan?

questions.q: Are the pancakes flipped with a fork or fish slice spatula?
followup: Is the batter cooked for 1 min or until the top starts to bubble?

questions.q: Are the pancakes cooked for 20-30 seconds extra?
followup: Did the person flip the pancakes with a for or fish shaped spatula?

questions.q: Are the pancakes transferred to a plate?
followup: Have the pancakes been cooked for 20-30 seconds more?

questions.q: Are the pancakes served with chopped strawberries?
followup: Is a strawberry chopped?
Are the pancakes transferred to a plate?

questions.q: Is maple syrup splashed on the plate?
followup: Are the pancakes served with chopped strawberries?
Are the contents of an egg extracted and added to a microwave-safe bowl?

questions.q: Is the mixture microwaved for 3 minutes while stirring in between?
followup: Has the egg been whisked?

questions.q: Is 1/2 tbsp of sweet and sour sauce added to the bowl?
followup: Has the mixture been microwaved for 3 minutes while stirring in between?

questions.q: Is 1 tbsp of salsa is added to the bowl?
followup: Has the mixture been microwaved for 3 minutes while stirring in between?

questions.q: Does the person sprinkle oregano into the bowl?

questions.q: Are the contents of the bowl mixed well?

Has an 8-inch tortilla been placed on the cutting board?

questions.q: Does the person sprinkle 1 tbsp of shredded cheddar cheese on top of egg?

questions.q: Is the tortilla rolled from one end to another into log shape about 1.5 inches thick, tight enough to prevent gaps but not so tight that the filling leaks?
